pages.text: notables! Give me your opinion on my vision, if you can interpret visions.”
They said, “What confused dreams! And we are not experts in the interpretation of dreams!”
Now the one who had been saved among the two said, remembering after a while, “I shall inform you of its interpretation, so send me forth.”

“Joseph, O truthful one! Give us thine opinion concerning seven fat cows being eaten by seven lean ones, and seven green heads of grain, and others dry, that haply I may return to the people, that they might know.”
He said, “You will sow diligently for seven years. Then whatever you harvest, leave in its ear, save a little that you eat
Then after this will come seven hard [years] which will devour that which you have saved in advance for them, save a little of that which you have stored
Then after this will come a year wherein people will be granted succor, and wherein they will press [wine and oil].”
The king said, “Bring him to me!” So when the messenger came to him he said, “Return to your lord and ask him, ‘What of the women who cut their hands? Surely my Lord knows well their scheming!’”

He said, “What was your purpose when you sought to lure Joseph from himself?” They said, “God be praised! We know no evil against him.” The viceroy’s wife said, “Now the truth has come to light. It was I who sought to lure him from himself, and verily he is among the truthful.”
